name: WhatsApp
description: This version: It’s now easier to start group voice and video calls. Just tap the call button in groups or select "New group call" when starting a new call in the calls tab. Group calls support up to 4 participants.

name: Facebook
description: Facebook is the official app of social network of the same name. Connectivity was never so easy before facebook.

name: Facebook Messenger
description: Facebook is the official app of social network of the same name. Now you can see your call history and missed calls; all in one place.

name: Slack
description: Dark Mode can now be switched on (or off) in the Settings menu. Yes, it’s been a long road, but there’s finally dark at the end of the tunnel. NB: This is mobile only for now, with desktop coming later — thank you for both bearing with us, and for continuing to expect more of us.
